dreisoft.tresos.generator.api.generator
Class GeneratorResource

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.generator.api.generator.GeneratorResource

public class GeneratorResource
extends java.lang.Object

A GeneratorResource is created via the CodeGeneratorContext to access transparently files stored in cryptocontainers, jar files and or normal files as input resource. A GeneratorResource to a normal file can be created: 

 GeneratorResource resource = generatorContext.getResource( "c:/tmp/file.tmp" );
When using a relative path the path is interpreted relative to the plug-in directory of the plug-in that registered the generator.

by just using the filename as the URI. To access a cryptoresource where the plug-in that registered the generator is the CryptoContainer use: 

 GeneratorResource resource = generatorContext.getResource( "crypto:template/Cfg.c" );
This statement searches the the file relativly to the plug-in root directory. If the cryptocontainer is not the plug-in use: 
 GeneratorResource resource = generatorContext.getResource( "crypto:c:/tmp/cryptocontainer!template/Cfg.c" );
Where the path before the '!' must reference the cryptocontainer and the path after the '!' is a relative path inside the crpyto container.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b
